title: Florida shooting suspect described as 'troubled'
text:
Florida shooting suspect described as 'troubled' 8:36am GMT - 02:21 
A nineteen-year-old gunman identified by police as Nikolas Cruz returns to a Florida high school where he had once been expelled and opens fire with an assault rifle, killing 17 people and wounding dozens more before his arrest. Reuters' Bernie Woodall spoke to several students at the scene. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
